snippet: Alberto Contador consolidated his overall race lead in the Vuelta a España by powering forward on the final ascent and winning the 16th stage.
abstract: Alberto Contador consolidates his overall race lead in the Vuelta a Espana, winning the 16th stage.
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador consolidated his overall race lead in the Vuelta a España by powering forward on the final ascent and winning the 16th stage.

headline.main: Contador Maintains Lead at Vuelta a España
